results.deck: Maid Meets Cat developed this visual novel about a boy who's mother supposedly was a mermaid.
results.name: L@ve Once: Mermaid's Tears

results.deck: Finally, a PachiSlot-style PS3 game that tells the new sea story I've been craving!
results.name: Pachi Para 17 ~New Sea Story With Agnes Lum~

results.deck: The Power Pro Baseball series continues for the 2010 season.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2010

results.deck: This Evangelion-themed Pachi game was released for PlayStation 3.
results.name: Ultra Hot!! Pachi Game Spirit CR Evangelion ~The First Gospel~

results.deck: A cancelled entry in Ubisoft's tactical shooter series that would have been about an armed uprising against the US government. The game was succeeded by Rainbow Six: Siege.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow 6: Patriots

results.deck: This sequel to the sci-fi visual novel Muv-Luv has protagonist Takeru Shirogane reliving the events of the previous game. But being aware of what is ahead, he hopes to change things for the better and give humanity a chance against the alien onslaught.
results.name: Muv-Luv Alternative

results.deck: Someday we'll all fly away to that great pachi paradise in the sky. Until then, there's always this PlayStation 3 game.
results.name: Pachi Para 16 ~Silver Shining Paradise 2~

results.deck: Play Go on your PS3 with this particularly strong installment.
results.name: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Igo: Hybrid Monte Carlo

results.deck: This 2010 edition of Germany's Next Topmodel features models at or near the top of modeldom. Modeling? Whatever.
results.name: Germany's Next Topmodel 2010

results.deck: This PS3 release is part of the Macross Frontier The Movie: The False Songstress Hybrid Pack.
results.name: Macross Trial Frontier

results.deck: Don't confuse this with some kind of other, non-super Okinawan sea.
results.name: Pachi Para 15 ~Super Sea in Okinawa 2~

results.deck: When invading aliens capture the Saints and imprison their minds in a digital recreation of Steelport, it's up to the Boss (who by now has become the President of the United States) to free Earth from its oppressive new overlords.
results.name: Saints Row IV

results.deck: Game of Thrones is an action RPG from Atlus and developer Cyanide, featuring a story written under the supervision of series creator George R.R. Martin.
results.name: Game of Thrones

results.deck: Gundam Unicorn is an action game based on the OVA's first three episodes.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn

results.deck: Sony's baseball sim for the 2012 MLB season.
results.name: MLB 12: The Show

results.deck: A PlayStation 3 and Vita HD compilation of Jak & Daxter: The Precursor Legacy, Jak II, and Jak 3.
results.name: Jak and Daxter Collection

results.deck: Sequel to 2008's LEGO Batman, Batman and Robin are forced to work together alongside the likes of Superman, Wonder Woman and Green Lantern to help stop the combined tyranny of Lex Luthor and The Joker.
results.name: LEGO Batman 2: DC Super Heroes

results.deck: PlayStation Move sports minigame collection.
results.name: After Hours Athletes

results.deck: Japanese eroge visual novel featuring five heroines. Consists of two parts: Muv-Luv Extra and Muv-Luv Unlimited. Adult content is not present in 360 and PS3 versions.
results.name: Muv-Luv

results.deck: A WWII shooter from City Interactive and Stuart Black, the creator of Black. It is slated for release on June 10th, 2014.
results.name: Enemy Front

results.deck: The stakes are raised in this second PlayStation Move-focused Start the Party release.
results.name: Start the Party: Save the World

results.deck: Meet your match in this open-city release for PS3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Machi-ing Maker 4

results.deck: An Obsidian-developed role-playing game based on the South Park animated TV series, in which players control a new kid in the eponymous town of South Park and takes part in an epic pretend-fantasy story that threatens the entire town.
results.name: South Park: The Stick of Truth

results.deck: Joel and Ellie must survive in a post-apocalyptic world where a deadly parasitic fungus infects people's brains in this  PS3 exclusive third-person action-adventure game from Naughty Dog.
results.name: The Last of Us

results.deck: Heavy Fire: Afghanistan is a on-rails arcade shooter set in modern-day Afghanistan. It is the third game in the Teyon's Heavy Fire series, the first at retail.
results.name: Heavy Fire: Afghanistan

results.deck: Developed by Supermassive Games, The Eternity Clock has players mastering the complex art of time-travel while trying to save the Earth.
results.name: Doctor Who: The Eternity Clock

results.deck: The third game in the Warriors Orochi series featuring 120 playable characters from a multitude of Tecmo Koei franchises.
results.name: Warriors Orochi 3

results.deck: Codemasters' latest entry into their rally series is an arcade spin-off. Featuring over-the-top demolition, and hoonigan action, as well as race events.
results.name: Dirt Showdown

results.deck: This German game show is available for multiple platforms in Germany.
results.name: Schlag den Raab – Das 2. Spiel

results.deck: The developers of The Fight return to the PlayStation Move with a motion-based fitness game.
results.name: Move Fitness

results.deck: The next installment of 2K's baseball sim.
results.name: Major League Baseball 2K12

results.deck: A follow-up to Sengoku Basara: Samurai Heroes, Sengoku Basara 3: Utage features more playable characters and gameplay options.
results.name: Sengoku Basara 3 Utage

results.deck: Nocturne of Truth and Illusion is a PS3 remake of Episodes 5-8 in the Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru series.
results.name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru ~Nocturne of Truth and Illusion~

results.deck: The classic tactical turn-based combat returns in this modern re-imagining of X-COM: UFO Defense.
results.name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown

results.deck: This PS3 Macross game is included on a hybrid Blu-Ray along with a Macross animated film.
results.name: Macross Frontier The Movie: The Wings of Goodbye Hybrid Pack

results.deck: Epic Mickey goes multiplatform in this Disney-published sequel. The game includes co-op in which players can play as Oswald the Lucky Rabbit.
results.name: Disney Epic Mickey 2: The Power of Two

results.deck:
A first-person survival horror game from Vivec Entertainment. 

Jack, a thief, is on an industrial espionage mission to steal blueprints of a new product. However, as he makes his way into the office complex he discovers that not everything about this place is what it appears to be.
results.name: Shadow of a Soul

results.deck: Fix the... time arrows (?) in this December 2011 PlayStation 3 release from 5pb and Rejet.
results.name: Beyond the Future: Fix the Time Arrows

results.deck: This PS3 hunting game is built around the use of the PlayStation Move.
results.name: Hunter's Trophy

results.deck: Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends is a driving game featuring scenarios that span the history of Ferrari, from the 1940s to present-day.
results.name: Test Drive: Ferrari Racing Legends

results.deck: Captain Morgane and the Golden Turtle is a traditional point-and-click adventure game set in the Caribbean.
results.name: Captain Morgane and the Golden Turtle

results.deck: The Idolm@ster series continues on the PlayStation 3.
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 1

results.deck: An anime-style Japanese RPG developed by Imageepoch for the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Time and Eternity

results.deck: The technically eighth entry in the popular horror series features the return of leading protagonists Leon S. Kennedy and Chris Redfield, along with new character Jake Muller, to combat against the latest B.O.W. manufacturer Neo-Umbrella.
results.name: Resident Evil 6

results.deck: The sequel to My Body Coach is available for the Wii and PlayStation 3.
results.name: My Body Coach 2

results.deck: Visual novel set in a town said to be protected by spirits.
results.name: Suzukaze no Melt: Where Wishes are Drawn to Each Other

results.deck: Ride a real exercise bike while your console eggs you on with Cyberbike 2.
results.name: Cyberbike 2

results.deck: GN Software produced this visual novel-style adventure game for Japanese markets in 2011.
results.name: Suigetsu 2

results.deck: Another entry in Chunsoft's murder mystery adventure games, this time for the PlayStation 3 and Vita.
results.name: Shin Kamaitachi no Yoru: 11 Hitome no Suspect

results.deck: This sequel to Skylanders: Spyro's Adventure introduces new "Giant" Skylanders to the toy-based action series from developer Toys For Bob. All the original Skylanders figures are useable this sequel, with 16 new Skylanders being added as well.
results.name: Skylanders Giants

results.deck: Battleship is a tie-in to the movie of the same name that is loosely based on the board game of the same name. Don't let aliens sink your battleship!
results.name: Battleship

results.deck: Join Sackboy as he takes on kart racing with his usual "Play, Create, Share" flair.
results.name: LittleBigPlanet Karting

results.deck: Madagascar 3: The Video Game is a game based on the third movie in the Madagascar franchise.
results.name: Madagascar 3: The Video Game

results.deck: Based on the movie of the same name.
results.name: Rise of the Guardians

results.deck: Get your French lawn bowling on in this PlayStation 3 release.
results.name: Obut Pétanque

results.deck: The fifth console entry in the Assassin's Creed franchise. It introduces the half-Native American, half-English Assassin Connor and is set in North America in the late eighteenth century amid the American Revolutionary War.
results.name: Assassin's Creed III

results.deck: This PlayStation 3 shogi game lets you play shogi on your PlayStation 3.
results.name: Shin Toudai Shogi

results.deck: Konami is publishing this WWII flight combat game.
results.name: Birds of Steel

results.deck: Play a little cricket with your Move controllers in this PlayStation 3 release.
results.name: Move Street Cricket

results.deck: Deep Silver is publishing this multiplatform look at the Summer Games.
results.name: Summer Stars 2012

results.deck: A sniping-based first-person shooter, developed by Hydravision Entertainment and published by Big Ben Interactive.
results.name: Snipers

results.deck: This gravure-tinged take on the Idolmaster is available in multiple volumes.
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 2

results.deck: More Idolmaster-themed gravure awaits in this third volume.
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 3

results.deck: A fourth volume of Idolmaster's gravure-themed offshoot? You might think it impossible, but here we are.
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 4

results.deck: Young Justice: Legacy is a game based on the Young Justice animated cartoon show. It is best known for its long, troubled development cycle.
results.name: Young Justice: Legacy

results.deck: A modern FPS that knits missions 'inspired by real events' into a narrative of shooting dudes in different countries.
results.name: Medal of Honor: Warfighter

results.deck: After two years off (and a cancelled name change), NBA Live was set to return for the 2012-2013 NBA season before it was officially cancelled on September 27, 2012. This marks the third year in a row that EA did not release an NBA simulation game.
results.name: NBA Live 13

results.deck: BandFuse: Rock Legends is a guitar tutor/game featuring Slash.
results.name: BandFuse: Rock Legends

results.deck: Race motorbikes in this licensed release from Black Bean and MileStone.
results.name: MUD: FIM Motocross World Championship

results.deck: NCAA Football 13 is EA Sports' college football sim for the 2012 season.
results.name: NCAA Football 13

results.deck: A fifth volume in Idolmaster's gravure-themed offshoot? No way!
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 5

results.deck: An updated port of G.Rev's Under Defeat.
results.name: Under Defeat HD

results.deck: This two game bundle features both Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles and Resident Evil: The Darkside Chronicles in high-definition with PlayStation Move support.
results.name: Resident Evil: Chronicles HD Collection

results.deck: To celebrate the 10 year anniversary of the first Ratchet & Clank, PlayStation 3 and Vita owners can get the original trilogy in a single collection.
results.name: Ratchet & Clank Collection

results.deck: The official video game of the London Olympic Games, held in Summer 2012.
results.name: London 2012 - The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games

results.deck: A game based on the Pixar animated fantasy movie Brave.
results.name: Disney-Pixar Brave

results.deck: The third annual F1 game from Codemasters.
results.name: F1 2012

results.deck: Madden NFL 13 is Electronic Arts' football sim for the 2012-2013 NFL season.
results.name: Madden NFL 13

results.deck: A PS3-exclusive free-roaming RPG developed by Compile Heart. It is unrelated to MUGEN, the popular open source fighting game engine.
results.name: Mugen Souls

results.deck: KT's horse racing franchise continues on with Winning Post 7 2012.
results.name: Winning Post 7 2012

results.deck: An upcoming RPG based on Brandon Sanderson’s fantasy series Mistborn.
results.name: Mistborn: Birthright

results.deck: Engage in ancient combat with the deadliest of warriors in this 345 Games banger. A remastered compilation of Deadliest Warrior: The Game and Deadliest Warrior: Legends.
results.name: Deadliest Warrior: Ancient Combat

results.deck: The Dream C Club franchise spawns a mahjong game. Finally.
results.name: Mahjong ★ Dream C Club

results.deck: The 2012 entry in the longrunning Japanese baseball series.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2012

results.deck: An updated version of Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2011 released after the end of the 2011 NPB season.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2011 Ketteiban

results.deck: NHL 13 is the 21st installment in the NHL franchise by EA SPORTS.
results.name: NHL 13

results.deck: Damage Inc.: Pacific Squadron WWII is an air combat game set in WWII developed by Trickstar Games.
results.name: Damage Inc.: Pacific Squadron WWII

results.deck: Directed by Hideyuki Shin and written by Suda51, Killer is Dead is a third-person action game following fictional assassin, Mondo Zappa.
results.name: Killer is Dead

results.deck: The fourteenth installment in Gust's Atelier series and the beginning of the Dusk Trilogy.
results.name: Atelier Ayesha: The Alchemist of Dusk

results.deck: The third Lost Planet game, developed by Spark Unlimited. A prequel to the first two games and the first title in the series not developed internally at Capcom.
results.name: Lost Planet 3

results.deck: A mysteriously resurrected Prophet fights his way through the now literal jungles of the fallen New York City, continuing the fight against the malevolent Ceph alien invaders.
results.name: Crysis 3

results.deck: The third title in the Neptunia series where Neptune ends up in a parallel world based on the Gamindustri of 1989. It is said to be the last game in the saga, but not the series.
results.name: Hyperdimension Neptunia Victory

results.deck: The Black Ops storyline continues, switching the past Cold War from the game's predecessor to future 2025, as a new Cold War between U.S.A. and China flares up due to the actions of one vengeful drug-runner.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II

results.deck: Reprise the role of James Bond as he relives key parts from five of the classic 007 films, leading up to a mission from the 2012 film Skyfall.
results.name: 007 Legends

results.deck: Before he was a God, Kratos was a man. A prequel, God of War: Ascension is the fourth major title of the God of War series, and Kratos' second outing on the PS3. It is the first to include a multiplayer component.
results.name: God of War: Ascension

results.deck: Players compete in a variety of minigames based around stereotypical gender roles.
results.name: The Ultimate Battle of the Sexes: Quiz & Play!

results.deck: Get touched and shot in this application of love for the PlayStation 3. See? Writing decks for games you know nothing about is easy, people.
results.name: Touch, Shot! Love Application

results.deck: Volume 6 of the astounding Idolmaster gravure spin-off is now available in Japan.
results.name: The Idolmaster: Gravure for You! Vol. 6

results.deck: Legasista is a return to the days of the classic dungeon crawling RPG. The game also features a fully loaded hefty character editor, to make your party members however you want.
results.name: Legasista

results.deck: Characters from various Sony franchises, and several guests, including one who was originally Xbox-exclusive, battle it out in this crossover arena fighting game intended to be the next Super Smash Bros.!
results.name: PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale
